EmailTemplate.name: Complaints Markets Case Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c}
Thank you for raising your concern with us and allowing us the opportunity to investigate and resolve your complaint.
We have received your complaint and giving it our full attention.
For any future correspondence regarding your complaint, please quote the following complaint reference number: #{!Case.CaseNumber}
We do apologise for any inconvenience that may have been caused and would like to assure you that we will provide you with the best quality service at every step of the way.
If you would like to contact us, please feel free to send us an email on AbcapMarketsbusiness@barclayscapital.com.
Yours sincerely
Complaints Team
